title: Android app deals of the day: Battleship, Clue, Monopoly, Shattered Plane, and more.
content:
We are ready to head into the weekend with today’s best Android app deals including a host of classic board games in digital form. These price drops join deals on the new Samsung Galaxy Tab S8/+ models as well as the ASUS Chromebook CM3 with a detachable keyboard. But as far as the apps go, our collection of Google Play offers are headlined by titles like Battleship, Star Link 2, The Game of Life 2, Monopoly, Shattered Plane, and more. Head below for a closer look at Friday’s best.

more…
